changeSet.sql: create sequence campaign_seq; create table if not exists campaign ( id bigint not null constraint campaign_pkey primary key, friendly_url varchar(255) constraint campaign_uk_on_friendlyUrl unique, funding_goals bigint, market_image_url varchar(255), max_equity_offered double precision, min_equity_offered double precision, name varchar(255) constraint campaign_uk_on_name unique, time_to_raise_funds bytea );
